nodes.text: The apple looks like it hasn't been sitting here very long... the skin hasn't turned brown yet.
Whoa, it looks like this core was thrown hard at something. There's splat marks on the ground where it bounced.
It definitely looks as if this is the thief's regular path. There are several blue hairs on the floor near here.
I guess that the thief isn't a big fan of the Headmaster... I can see apple bits on the bust's face where the apple core hit it.
I can see some hairs near the lion guy statue.

Given all the upkeep that has to be done on this castle, who knows when this particular room was last swept out? These hairs could be here from the time of the great blue knights who roamed the countryside riding on giant blue hamsters.

options.text: Set a Trap near the Apple Core

nodes.text: I think there's a better place to set a trap...
If I try putting some gooey down here, maybe then I can catch the thief.
If I try putting a trap down here, maybe then I can catch the thief.
I'm going to hide over by the book shelves. Maybe if I get bored waiting, I can just read for a while.
<yawn> I'm too tired to wait anymore. Maybe tomorrow night...
I knew I should have bought a trap or some gooey when I had the chance!
It might tip the thief that I'm here if he comes back to find the core missing from where he left it. I guess I'll just leave it.
